scripts.link-web: cd packages/hcl-sdk-web-ui && yarn unlink && yarn link
scripts.link-react: cd packages/hcl-sdk-web-ui-react && yarn link && cd ../../examples/web/react && yarn && yarn link '@healthcarelocator/sdk-react'
scripts.build-example-react: yarn build-web && yarn build-devtools && yarn build-react && yarn link-react && yarn build
scripts.start-example-react: yarn build-web && yarn prepare-devtool-react && yarn build-react && yarn link-react && yarn start-example-react-only
scripts.link-angular: cd packages/hcl-sdk-web-ui-angular/dist/hcl-sdk && yarn link && cd ../../../../examples/web/angular && yarn && yarn link '@healthcarelocator/sdk-angular'
scripts.link-web-to-example-angular: yarn link-web && cd examples/web/angular && yarn link @healthcarelocator/sdk-web
scripts.build-example-angular: yarn build-web && yarn build-devtools && yarn build-angular && yarn link-angular && yarn build
scripts.start-example-angular: yarn build-web && yarn prepare-devtool-angular && yarn build-angular && yarn link-angular && yarn link-web-to-example-angular && yarn start-example-angular-only
scripts.build-example-web: yarn clean-example-web && yarn build-web && yarn build-devtools && rm -rf ./examples/web/cdn/hcl-sdk-web-ui && cp -R ./packages/hcl-sdk-web-ui/dist/hcl-sdk ./examples/web/cdn/hcl-sdk-web-ui && rm -rf ./examples/web/cdn/hcl-sdk-tools && cp -R ./packages/hcl-sdk-web-devtools/dist/devtools ./examples/web/cdn/hcl-sdk-tools
